column4: Hi I need a win&lin programming code editor supporting syntax colouring for major languages, and any other simple aids would be nice too (not vim, emacs, anything that deals with the web, stuff that makes guis please)... any ideas?
oh and anything made using JAVA!
ah in shit that deals with html or making webpages
